name: Coin Madness
description:
Welcome to Coin Madness, where your goal is to collect Coins in artificial worlds and eventually Save the Day.

In this adventure you will explore multiple different areas with enemies and lots of collectibles!

Developed in Scratch (and later TurboWarp for extra performance), reaching just shy of 15000 blocks of code. (not even optimized lmao)

Use the arrow keys or W, A, S, D to move. Z och Space for jumping and X for using items. Collect 10 Coins in order to progress to the next level. Other instructions are given in-game.

IN PROGRESS! Some Levels are not finished, help is appreciated in order to get done with this abomination.

(NOT RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN EITHER FIREFOX, CHROME OR OPERA GX, GAME LAGS A LOT AND WILL NOT WORK PROPERLY! USE EDGE OR SOMETHING)
